##InClass Problems

```{r}
dat <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/biolDataScience/biolDataScience.github.io/refs/heads/master/static/data/traitData.csv")

plot(as.factor(dat$Family.2), dat$Beak.Depth)
title('Beak Depth based on Family of Animal')
points(y=dat$Beak.Depth, x=dat$Family.2, 
       out.pch=16, pch=18,
       col=1:4)
```






















set.seed(123)
```{r}
set.seed(123)
control <- rnorm(100, 2, 0.1)
N <- rnorm(100, 3, 0.25)
P <- rnorm(100, 3.5, 0.5)
NP <- rnorm(100, 6, 0.4)
```

```{r}
plantDF <- data.frame(performance=c(control, N, P, NP), 
  treatment=c(
    rep('control',100), rep('N', 100), 
    rep('P', 100), rep('NP',100))
)

plot(as.factor(plantDF$treatment), plantDF$performance)

boxplot(plantDF$performance ~ plantDF$treatment)
```
